name: HomeShikari
overview:
HomeShikari is an online real estate portal functioning with an aim to bring in transparency and clarity in the real estate sector.

It is a part of TTK group of companies which is a trusted name since 1928. Apart from just serving precise property details, the firm also offers property related services from tenant management to rental agreement drafting, property paperwork gathering, property tax payment, property buying/selling assistance and other related services.

The firm aims to empower the consumers to make the right decision while investing in a property by offering unbiased information, allied services and hassle free online experience. HomeShikari completely omits brokers from all its services and has all the information on the site without any advertisements and spamming. This way a home buyer will not have to pay any brokerage fee and can avail all the consumer friendly services.
